original_title: UFC on ESPN 4: Dos Anjos vs. Edwards
overview: UFC on ESPN 4: dos Anjos vs. Edwards was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on July 20, 2019 at the AT&T Center in San Antonio, Texas. A welterweight bout between former UFC Lightweight Champion Rafael dos Anjos and Leon Edwards was the event headliner.
title: UFC on ESPN 4: Dos Anjos vs. Edwards
